page.title: 04Schools
page.content: The First School ================ There are 107 pupils in the school and 4 classes. They do Maths, PE, Reading, Drawing, Painting. There is plenty to do at wet or dry break. They get no homework apart from spellings which they get in the second and third years. The head likes working at the school, her name is Mrs Thomas. The school is split into two groups. The Grange School ================= There are 580 pupils in the school and 24 tutor groups. They do PE, Maths, English, French, History, Typing, Environmental Studies, Chemistry, Home Economics. They get a lot of homework. The school is 25 years old and has a very large stage, a choir and 20 computers.
